name.baseName: Western-style snacks ; Wheat flour ; Powder blending + dough making + baking ; greater than or equal to2000 t/a; NESPS2
西式点心 ; 小麦粉 ; 配粉+和面+烘焙 ; 大于等于0.2万吨/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + bio-contact oxidation process + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.04

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + bio-contact oxidation process + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.04
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程涉及利用小麦粉配粉、和面和烘焙程序进行西式点心的大规模制造。该过程的能力指标为每年大于或等于2000吨。此数据集适用于食品行业中，特别是在工业规模生产烘焙食品的公司。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码14,四级代码1411文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysical treatment + membrane separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96.35
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是物理处理法+膜分离，其效率为96.35，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时）/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为石油类
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment + membrane separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.78
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理处理法+膜分离，其效率为98.78，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时）/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮
nan
源文件中描述为为西式点心，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysical treatment + bio-contact oxidation process + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management93.83
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是物理处理法+生物接触氧化法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为93.83，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时）/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为石油类
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
